page.title: 17INVERECK CARAVAN PARK
page.content: Invereck Caravan Park is in the country next to a farm.When you go there,there is a white house where the owners live.On one side of the road that leads to the park there are trees and on the other side is the back of the house.The office is a small wooden hut.2 sides of the park have got caravans.Next to the office are the ladies and gentlemens toilets and showers.There is a road all round the park and down the middle.The park is surrounded by trees with a river beside them.There is a fence nearly all the way round.At the far side of the park there is a games room. The caravan park used to be a pasture for animals.It has been a caravan park for 7 or 8 years.The park is near a snack bar where the visitors can get food.
